Package org.fosstrak.llrp.client

Interface Summary
LLRPExceptionHandler All exception handlers registered at the AdaptorManagement need to implement this interface in order to be delivered with exceptions triggered on the reader level.
MessageHandler All processes that want to receive messages from the AdaptorManagement need to implement this interface.
Repository This single access point for Reader Management module to access the message repository.
 

Class Summary
LLRPMessageItem This wrapper class for LLRP Message.
Reader This wrapper class for Reader.
 

Enum Summary
LLRPExceptionHandlerTypeMap
